feed.title: How They Discovered Something Worth Knowing

entry.title: A New Start
entry.content:
Its been a long time since I updated my blog, in fact all my old blog posts I havent bothered to move over yet to this new format. I may do that, but for now I am going to just start over clean. I hope to write more about my observations on OpenStack, a bit about my role at HPCloud, Internet of Things work I am doing, Arduino Gadgets I am building.. and the list goes on. Stay tuned.

m
